title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
**Unleash Your Adventure Spirit with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Watch**

Take your outdoor adventures to the next level with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS watch. Designed for surfers, windsurfers, and kiteboarders, this rugged watch is packed with features that will help you ride the waves and conquer the elements.

**Unlimited Power with Solar Charging**

Say goodbye to battery anxiety with our solar charging capabilities. With just 3 hours of sunlight per day, you can enjoy unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode. Plus, get up to 48 hours of continuous GPS tracking with solar charging.

**Catch Every Wave with Surfing Features**

Track your waves, max speed, distance, and tide data with our advanced surfing features. Plus, get access to Surfline Sessions for detailed surf forecasts and reports.

**Conquer the Skies with Windsurfing and Kiteboarding Features**

Take your windsurfing and kiteboarding to new heights with our GPS position, speed tracking, distance tracking, heart rate monitoring, and elevation data for jumps.

**Stay Connected and On Top of Your Game**

Stay connected with smart notifications, and access a range of preloaded activity profiles for running, biking, swimming, and strength training. Plus, navigate with ease using our 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and satellite systems (GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo).

**Stay on Top of Your Health**

Monitor your heart rate, sleep, Pulse Ox, and respiration tracking with our advanced health monitoring features.

**Built to Last**

Our watch is built to withstand the toughest conditions, with a water rating of 100 meters, thermal resistance, shock resistance, and a durable fiber-reinforced polymer case.

**Upgrade Your Adventure Today**

Get ready to take your outdoor adventures to the next level with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS watch. Order now and experience the ultimate in outdoor performance and style.

**Key Features:**

* Solar charging capabilities for unlimited battery life
* Surfing features: wave counter, max speed tracking, distance tracking, tide data
* Windsurfing and kiteboarding features: GPS position, speed tracking, distance tracking, heart rate monitoring, elevation data for jumps
* Preloaded activity profiles: running, biking, swimming, strength training
* Navigation: 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, satellite systems (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo)
* Health monitoring: heart rate, sleep, Pulse Ox, respiration tracking
* Water rating: 100 meters, thermal resistance, shock resistance
* Durable fiber-reinforced polymer case and scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass
* Compatible with Surfline Sessions, smart notifications, and Connect IQ

**Order Now and Experience the Ultimate in Outdoor Performance and Style**
